name: SuperPong (Goneril)
description:
This is a 2 player game.

We gave up on the online mode because of too much latency.

Anyway ! Feel free to propose new characters, all you need is a color and two powers.

IN GAME

Player 1
Up - Z/W
Down - S
Special 1 (30pts) - D
Special 2 (50pts) - Q

Player 2
Up - I
Down - K
Special 1 (30pts) - J
Special 2 (50pts) - L

IN CHARACTER SELECTION

Player 1
Move cursor - S
Select - D
Cancel - Q

Player 2
Move cursor - K
Select - J
Cancel - L
